thread.title: Gavin

author: Gavin
title: Gavin
text: I use an organic farm in North California for fruit trees but due to limited availability with viable pear trees for my area I search elsewhere. Willis offered bigger trees for less $. I was hesitant with my decision as I did not get much communication concerning the 'processing' of my order. They arrived after two and a half weeks and I was more than satisfied. Mine were 5'5" and healthy trees that are starting to bloom after only three weeks in the ground. Definitely value for money!
